vendor_name: Pullman Nadi Bay Resort & Spa Fiji
title: New Pullman Beachfront Luxury for Families and Couples with Nightly Drinks
description: Among the newest resorts to open in Nadi’s up-and-coming precinct of Wailoaloa, Pullman Nadi Bay Resort and Spa Fiji brings five-star indulgence to the shores of the South Pacific's most popular island. Wailoaloa offers a pristine stretch of white sandy beach, one of Fiji's best swimming spots. You'll wake up to daily buffet breakfast, and enjoy nightly house wine or beer, three two-course lunches, a 60-minute massage each and more. Two kids stay and eat free with two complimentary days of Kids or Teen Club entry if you're travelling with the family, and don’t miss the romantic couples’ rooms and upgrade options available.
location_description: Pullman Nadi Bay Resort and Spa Fiji
offer_address: Nadi Bay Road Wailoaloa Beach Wailoaloa Beach, Fiji

title: All-Inclusive Dining: Island Paradise in Fiji
description: Set your watch to island time and escape to one of Fiji’s most renowned private island resorts, Castaway Island Fiji. Embrace laid-back island life staying five nights in a traditional bure with all-inclusive dining featuring full buffet breakfasts, delicious à la carte and themed buffet lunches and dinners, choice of a family pass (including a beachfront dining experience, bottle of sparkling, five hours of babysitting and family activities) or R&R pass (including a romantic beachfront dinner, bottle of sparkling, couple’s spa treatment, manicure/pedicure or head and shoulder massage) and more.

title: Private Fiji Island Escape with Dining and Drinks
description:
Experience the white-sand beaches and coral-filled waters of Fiji's private island hideaway, Toberua Island Resort. Discover South Pacific beauty staying in an exclusive beachfront bure and enjoy daily buffet breakfast overlooking the ocean, a nightly glass of wine or beer, return land and boat transfers to the island, two four-course dinners, one 30-minute relaxation massage each, unlimited reef golf plus complimentary island activities including kayaking, snorkelling, stand-up paddle boarding and more. 

**Travelling as a family?** Up to two children (aged 11 years and under) stay free with transfers.

title: Shangri-La: Fiji’s Most Iconic Resort
description: Escape to a private island paradise on Fiji’s Coral Coast, at one of the most iconic resorts in the South Pacific. Experience a warm Fijian welcome at Shangri-La’s Fijian Resort & Spa, where aquamarine waters and palm-fringed sands provide the setting for an unforgettable family escape. Enjoy daily breakfasts, three buffet dining experiences, six massages to share, authentic Fijian experiences and much more - plus, up to two kids stay and eat free.
offer_address: Yanuca Island, Coral Coast, Islands, Fiji, Fiji

title: The Ultimate VIP All-Inclusive Fijian Escape
description: Indulge in all-inclusive, celebrity-style luxury at the adults-only Tadrai Island Resort - Fiji. Begin your VIP experience with helicopter transfers from Nadi to the resort before checking into a beautiful Selena Cove Deluxe Villa (one of only five on the island) with a private plunge pool and panoramic ocean views. Includes daily à la carte breakfasts, lunches and dinners - including a special lunch experience on a sandbar in the sea and a private beach dinner under the stars - all drinks including alcohol and nightly cocktails, a daily massage per person and much more.

title: Tropical Adults-Only Eco Getaway with All-Inclusive Meals
description: Escape to a boutique island perched on the azure waters of Fiji's Beqa Island and nestled amid vibrant, untouched rainforest. This quintessential South Pacific escape places the natural underwater and overwater wonders of this country right on your doorstep at Lalati Resort & Spa. Enjoy all-inclusive dining as well as two one-hour massages to share, private VIP return land and sea transfers, use of non-motorised water equipment and complimentary daily cultural activities.

title: Couples Oasis: Breakfasts, dinners & cocktails
description: Experience the beautiful beaches, glittering lagoons, friendly locals and fresh seafood of Fiji's famous Mamanuca Islands with five nights staying in a Sanctuary Pool Suite with private plunge pool at the adults-only Tropica Island Resort. Includes daily continental breakfast, nightly a la carte dinners, daily cocktails and a 60-minute massage each for two adults.
offer_address: Malolo Island, Mamanuca Islands, Fiji, Malolo Levu, Fiji

title: The Ultimate VIP All-Inclusive Fijian Escape
description: Indulge in all-inclusive, celebrity-style luxury at the adults-only Tadrai Island Resort. Embrace a romantic island getaway while staying in a beautiful Selena Cove Deluxe Villa - one of only five on the island - with a private plunge pool and panoramic ocean views. Indulge with daily à la carte breakfasts, lunches and dinners - including a special lunch experience on a sandbar in the sea and a private beach dinner under the stars - all drinks including alcohol and nightly cocktails, a daily massage per person and much more.
